prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Bass, Piano, Guitar, Reed, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
No Drums are present in this song, but it does feature Bass, Piano, Guitar, and Reed.

Style 2:
This composition is comprised of Bass, Piano, Guitar, and Reed, but without the addition of Drums.

Style 3:
This piece of music is composed of Bass, Piano, Guitar, and Reed, omitting Drums.
